rooms.description: A modern open-plan living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north facade to maximize natural light.
A functional dining room adjacent to the living area, with views towards the spacious front garden.
A modern kitchen layout featuring integrated appliances and a breakfast counter. Incorporates Vastu recommendations by placing it in the southeast direction.
A guest bedroom with ample space and a built-in balcony overlooking the garden. Vastu placement ensures energy flow.
A compact master suite with attached bathroom and a balcony. Floor-to-ceiling windows enhance natural light while adhering to Vastu.
Primary bathroom for the master suite with modern fixtures and ample ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance facing the front garden with a modern door design.
Spacious balcony attached to the guest room and master suite, offering panoramic views.
Additional balcony for the guest room, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling window on the north facade for enhanced natural lighting and ventilation.
Floor-to-ceiling window in the kitchen area for light and Vastu alignment.
Internal door connecting living room to guest room.
